Articles.Content: Using Right-Shift as a mod key is not very convenient as I have to move my left hand across the whole keyboard, is there a way to remap it to Windows key?

The names you can use in settings.cfg are here:

http://docs.unity3d.com/ScriptReference/KeyCode.html

There is stuff like 'LeftWindows' etc...

In my experience not all have worked, because the linux-windows mapping isn't entirely correct.

You want to change the MODIFIER_KEY entry, of course.

Edited May 16, 2015 by surge

Yeah it can fail to work when set to some keys as those keys are already assigned by the operating system, this is why we don't have left alt for the mod key on Linux, Ubuntu uses left alt for "move window".
